item.title: By: John Breslin
item.dc:creator: John Breslin
item.description: I missed last year's event but would love to attend this years... (I wonder who the naysayers are!)
item.content:encoded: I missed last year’s event but would love to attend this years… (I wonder who the naysayers are!)

item.title: By: walter
item.dc:creator: walter
item.description:
> It should be accessible to as many people as possible IMHO.
That settles it so - Cork it is ! ;-)
item.content:encoded:
> It should be accessible to as many people as possible IMHO.

That settles it so – Cork it is !

item.title: By: Aido

item.description: Sounds like a great idea, hopefully outside of Dublin :)
item.content:encoded: Sounds like a great idea, hopefully outside of Dublin

item.title: By: Lenny
item.dc:creator: Lenny
item.description: Sounds like a great idea. Can I suggest Sligo as a possible venue?
item.content:encoded: Sounds like a great idea. Can I suggest Sligo as a possible venue?

item.title: By: Paul Walsh
item.dc:creator: Paul Walsh
item.description:
Paul, as you know, Ireland is seen as a cool place to visit, so thatâ€™s one good reason. It's also seen as a European hub for innovation. Unfortunately, I don't see much of this industry being raised through Enterprise Ireland as much as say, manufacturing.
I think we should call it Web2Ireland Conference and see if O'Reily publishers have something to say - that'll raise our profile even further ;)
item.content:encoded:
Paul, as you know, Ireland is seen as a cool place to visit, so thatâ€™s one good reason. It’s also seen as a European hub for innovation. Unfortunately, I don’t see much of this industry being raised through Enterprise Ireland as much as say, manufacturing.

I think we should call it Web2Ireland Conference and see if O’Reily publishers have something to say – that’ll raise our profile even further

item.title: By: Paul Walsh
item.dc:creator: Paul Walsh
item.description: This is a no brainer. YES! I'd love the opportunity to sit beside other cool Irish companies at this expo. Could be a seriously good way to raise our profile and the profile of Ireland within the Web 2.0 community!
item.content:encoded: This is a no brainer. YES! I’d love the opportunity to sit beside other cool Irish companies at this expo. Could be a seriously good way to raise our profile and the profile of Ireland within the Web 2.0 community!

item.title: By: Paul Browne - Technology in Plain English
item.dc:creator: Paul Browne - Technology in Plain English
item.description:
Will you be able to get a venue to hold all the potential attendees? Judging by the huge jump in Interest in the <a href="http://www.awards.ie/blogawards" rel="nofollow">Irish Blog Awards</a> (more than 2000 nominations), what sort of interest would we see in a Web2Ireland conference?
Paul
item.content:encoded:
Will you be able to get a venue to hold all the potential attendees? Judging by the huge jump in Interest in the Irish Blog Awards (more than 2000 nominations), what sort of interest would we see in a Web2Ireland conference?

Paul
